description: Alani is mummified from head to toe with only one eye exposed to allow her to catch a glimpse of where she is. She is hoisted up in to an inverted suspension, caned, and then left to hang there and orgasm uncontrollably. Stress positions are hard enough, but when bondage is there to keep her in this position it increases the pain. Plastic is wrapped around her head and she has a moment of panic before the air way is opened for her. Fear is something that Alani is struggling with, the unknown freaks her out, and I plan to use that to my advantage all day. After a brutal flogging, I show her that I control everything today, including when she breathes. The binds get tougher and the suffering increases throughout the day. She has a very large anal hook tied in her ass, and then I play a version of tic tac toe on her thigh that she will always remember.
title: Taking a Piece of Pi
